normalized: on november 10.
twelve days after our departure from perseus city.
the battleship, tristan, arrived safely in libra.
kila and i were waiting for a man at the libra space-station.
general william ahle moller of the neo-terras.
i had planned to capture him, after having lured him in by using kila as bait.
i had already notified the senile yet lustful old man that the brainwashing process on kila had been completed.
i had placed both my arms behind my back as i was pretending to be kila’s prisoner, which was all just a sham.
however, i wanted to make it seem like it was kila who had called moller, after capturing me.
it was all a scheme to help the old man, and kila’s father, lucius romanoff―― the new face of hope.
with that, i would be able to increase the debt of gratitude that lucius romanoff owed me.
kila looked to be back to her original self, now that she had been administered with drugs in order to block her nerves from carrying pleasure signals.
however, even though her entire body was no longer being tormented by pleasure, her personality was still the one which i had created for her.
kila had not been particularly pleased with this strategy of mine since the very beginning, and was frowning with her arms folded together across her chest.

name: bohgan
normalized: are you so annoyed because your father is going to take credit for this, kila?

name: kila
normalized: master bohgan!
please don’t refer to that shitty man as my father!
kila spoke to me while glaring at me with terrifying eyes, similar to the ones that she had possessed when she had pointed her knife at me.

name: kila
normalized: that guy… he may look to be a pure and innocent person on the outside, however, he has always looked at me with lecherous eyes.
i have always wanted to kill him.

name: bohgan
normalized: was it beatrice who stopped you from doing it?

name: kila
normalized: yes, because he was necessary for the revival of our home-nation.
moreover, that woman even offered me to that man.
since, she didn’t want to have sex with him herself.
kila hugged her body in disgust.

name: bohgan
normalized: how cruel.
did she really try to sacrifice you?

name: kila
normalized: they are a disgusting married couple.
even though they don’t love each at all, why do they continue to talk about their home-nation?
i just can’t understand it.
kila spit out those disdainful words.
however, all of these memories and emotions of hers had also been planted inside her by me.

name: bohgan
normalized: i have planned to impersonate lucius romanoff, and make use of that for my sake.
i can’t allow you to kill him now.

name: bohgan
normalized: it will “extend” my reach over the universe.
i can understand your feelings well, however, you need be patient.

name: kila
normalized: yes… i understand.
it is my pleasure to serve you, master bohgan.
kila said so, however, it seemed like her muddled emotions were difficult for the sentimental woman to suppress.

name: bohgan
normalized: in exchange for that, i will entrust lucius romanoff’s death to you.

name: kila
normalized: eh?
really?
kila’s face lit up in an instant.

name: bohgan
normalized: yes.
you may torture him to death or make his life a living hell, as is the case with beatrice.
it will be your choice.

name: kila
normalized: aha… thank you very much, master bohgan.
i am so glad that he will be unable to be attracted to me soon.

name: kila
normalized: and well, can you turn him into stone, like beatrice, and toss him into a den of homosexuals before i kill him?

name: bohgan
normalized: of course.
it isn’t really a particular hobby of mine though.

name: kila
normalized: nice, nice♪
in that case, leave his mouth alive.
so that a cock can be thrust into it, if he starts his annoying blabbering.
can you do that?
i smiled wryly while listening to kila’s joyful chatter, as if she was a little girl who had been told about her christmas present.

name: bohgan
normalized: you may discuss this particular matter with olov later.
he is way more knowledgeable about it than me.
for now, focus on the mission at hand.

name: kila
normalized: ah!
please, excuse me!
―― ufufu
kila composed herself immediately, however, the edges of her lips were still a bit loose.

name: bohgan
normalized: the old man’s escort consists of 12 specially trained soldiers.
be careful.

name: kila
normalized: of course.
actually, i don’t need the assistance of this chameleon of a woman here.
she is merely a distraction.

name: bohgan
normalized: ―― is she now?
did you hear that, naomi?
i called out to naomi, who was in her thermo-optic camouflage.

name: naomi
normalized: she is a silly little girl.
my gun-turtles are more than enough for this task.
just tell her to not shudder in fear.

name: naomi
normalized: anyway, once this pact is fulfilled, you will have to return miss rieri back to her original self.
don’t forget.
donny bohgan.

name: kila
normalized: huuh?
you are really aggressive, aren’t you?
kila gave her the sarcastic smile of the grim reaper.

name: kila
normalized: however, rieri bishop was your mistress, wasn’t she?
and she doesn’t even want to be together with you, does she?
isn’t it, master bohgan?

name: bohgan
normalized: well, that was never the case.
either way, i can train that woman like that if you want.

name: naomi
normalized: … there is no need for that.

name: kila
normalized: uwaah… she is so cute to cling to hope when there is none.

name: kila
normalized: can’t you find another loving man for yourself?
i didn’t think so.
it is really sad that you are proud of being such a plaything of a woman, despite being in the prime of your life.

name: naomi
normalized: do you want to be my plaything, little girl?

name: kila
normalized: try it.
my knife will be quicker at this distance.
both the women began to emanate a fierce bloodlust.
what a bothersome bunch.

name: bohgan
normalized: stop your annoying bickering, both of you.
looks like our target has arrived.
moller’s car was approaching us.
as expected, both of them composed themselves.
that’s it.
that’s the way.
work for me.
like pigs.

name: bohgan
normalized: well then, it is show-time!
devious scheming, raping women, and fighting.
my ambitions would continue to grow.
until the day i would extend my reach over the entire universe.
